name: Dark Whiteout
description:
A game made in a week!

Dark Whiteout is a mini blizzard survival and psychological horror game where you must do everything you can to survive until the end of the whiteout...

  • Keep your hunger and temperature bar full so you don't freeze or starve to death
  • Search for berry bushes and dead trees and harvest them for food and firewood
  • Take firewood back to your fireplace to keep the fire going and to keep warm
  • Avoid what's lurking in the dark
  • Survive until the end of the whiteout
